subTitle: The most common questions of our Prospective Client

faqs.question: How do you choose your client?
faqs.answer:
“Those who lack courage, will always find a way a philosophy to justify it. - Albert Camus”

There is only one criterion, I use to assess my prospective client with. Many people claim they want to achieve that highest state of ecstasy of creative flow. Some seek some spiritual guidance as well, and few others enlightenment.

 While most seek, an improvement in quality of life or new set of perception. I lead my clients to their desired state of being.  I am a practice based life-coach, and even clients with lower energy are welcome to work with me.

I ask myself however, does my prospective client, really want to make a change in their life or do they keep finding reasons for not trying something new. 

Do they believe in the sacredness of their own being, and are willing to do the work? Or are they hoping, that I will give them a magic pill or exercise, psychedelics or tantra, that will solve their issues?  

My work is all about active engagement, and personal involvement, and if my prospective client would keep finding reason or philosophy to not do the work, that client is not for me. They should keep doing what they are doing, keep looking further and take the next dopamine hit.

faqs.question: What does our first session look like?
faqs.answer:
This session is about giving you a peak into my framework, and establishing a common ground on the outlook of life.

 I believe all the interactions should flow naturally, and there is no driving necessity to perform or convince.Best work happens naturally in a goal-less setup.

faqs.question: How much do you charge for your first session?
faqs.answer: Our first session is completely free of charge, and do not incur any hidden costs.

faqs.question: Which languages do you provide the coaching in?
faqs.answer:
1. In the Western hemisphere of Earth, I am fluent in German, English, and Spanish, so I consult my clients in these languages.

2. In Indian subcontinent, I speak Hindi and English

faqs.question: How current are the online resources and tutorials?
faqs.answer: We regularly update our online resources and tutorials to reflect the latest trends in DIY and construction, as well as introductions to new tools and techniques. Our material aims to be comprehensive and user-friendly for all skill levels.

faqs.question: Does ScrewFast offer services for large-scale construction projects?
faqs.answer: Yes, our Enterprise Solutions are designed for larger companies requiring comprehensive services. We provide consultation, planning, and supply of high-grade tools and materials, as well as staffing solutions for substantial construction needs. Contact us for a customized quote.
